text: The Ufa Plateau () is a plateau where the city of Ufa is located in Bashkortostan and Sverdlovsk Oblast, Russia. Parts of the Ufa, Yuryuzan River, and Ay River basins are included in the plateau. The distance between the northern and southern ends of the plateau is . Category:Plateaus of Russia Category:Landforms of Sverdlovsk Oblast
title: Ufa Plateau
